violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: fmatesa
discussion.text: @goerz Ok now it should be fine. Sorry for the mess.

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text:
> Sorry for the mess.

That's okay, but next time, try to carefully read the guidelines and messages from the bot and plan ahead, so that it doesn't take quite as many attempts.

In any case, the three-day waiting period still applies for this registration. After it ends, you will have to go to the `#pgk-registration` channel on [Slack](https://julialang.org/slack/) and ask for a manual merge.
